entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
